review: Convenient and easy to use.  I love the ability to store unlimited photos and video on the Amazon Cloud and have them synced to my Amazon Firestick.
author: Insatiable "~To Be Old And Wise You Must First Be Young And Stupid~"

review: We tried to watch a movie last night. Jaws. They said we had to pay for it. Then it told me to go to some website and turn on one click.  I did that and still was unable to "rent" the movie. Also had to scroll for miles and miles to find a search tab to find a different movie. And no I don't want you or anyone else recommending movies or series for us to watch. Finally just watched a movie that was coming up on the screen.  So far. Not so good.
author: scoofyann

review: It does not meet my expectations.
author: LAMOUTIDJA  DJAGOUNTI

review: We love our fire stick as it allows us to access Netflix from any tv in our home!
author: KayCee

review: Very simple to setup and use. It will definitely replace my Chromecast and is a must-have if you're a prime member and all you have is a Chromecast.
author: Bill

review: Works great same as Fire TV with a smaller storage space.
